data.title: Robotics Stocks Surged on Wednesday. Here's Why. | The Motley Fool
data.description: Pure-play robotics stocks, such as Richtech Robotics and Serve Robotics, soared on Wednesday, and non-pure plays, including Tesla, also received a boost from reports that President Trump is considering actions to accelerate the development of robots in the U.S.
data.author: Beth McKenna
